title: Recommend some filters for the water(Not for drinking).
selftext:
My brother has shifted to a new flat and the tap water is really muddy there. He can't even use it for daily purposes. Can someone recommend me a good filter?  He won't be drinking it though only for shower and other purpose.

This is how the water looks

&#x200B;

https://preview.redd.it/cm97qec14yla1.png?width=550&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=8b3388bec39ea7f8a4eee8da1239e1dc95c642e7
comments: Can he ask someone to clean the overhead tank or something?
Tank is clean. The muddy water is coming from the municipality.
complaint karke dekho.. Twitter is the best way to get their attention
Keep the water running and see if it gets clearer. This can happen when they clean the system.
